Class AppointmentDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDao
public class AppointmentDaoImpl extends Object implements AppointmentDao
Appointment Dao implementation. Saves and retrieves data to and from database.

Brian Clavadetscher
